response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering you the chance to own this item at a special price of $950,000. This offer reflects my desire to see the product go to someone who truly appreciates its worth and can make the most of it. I believe this price strikes a balance between ensuring a fair return for me and providing you with an excellent deal. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.", "product_price": 950000}
